website_summaries.verdict: This luxurious mask yields the results expected of a high-end cosmetic brand.
pros: This mask, packed with botanical extracts, is particularly soothing
Removes excessive oil from pores and helps treat problem areas
Can be stored in the refrigerator for an extra cooling effect
cons: Some users didn't notice effects after the instructed 10 minute time frame, and only saw results when worn overnight

customer_reviews.title: Best face mask I own
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this mask. It really tightens and shrinks pores. You can see it working as it dries- it pulls up all the blackheads. I use it twice weekly for fresh, clean, toned skin and pores.
customer_reviews.author: D. Biondolillo

customer_reviews.title: This is the only mask I have ever used that ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the only mask I have ever used that I noticed a difference in my skin after taking it of. Not only does it make your skin soft, but it removes all of the texture from your skin. Obviously it won't remove acne, but it removed the small bumps I would get on my face. This is the only mask that I will use. I wish there was a larger size to purchase because it runs out quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It actually works
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive and acne-prone skin, so I'm always skeptical about using a new face product. The first time I used this mask, I actually saw a difference in my skin, my pores were smaller and CLEAN! The smell is weird, but it's not bad. The texture is very smooth, I used a rubber makeup "brush" to apply evenly. The price is amazing, it's way cheaper than GlamGlow, and you get the same result as well. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: V SUYENAGA

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a weird residue on your face
customer_reviews.text: The mask smells nice and exfoliates well but it leaves behind a weird, waxy residue on my face after I wash it off. I've used 4 of the different L'Oreal face masks (the black, red, green, and blue ones) and in general have been very pleased, so this one is an outlier. The residue is thick, opaque, and really waxy. I have to scrape it off my face after I wash the mask off.
customer_reviews.author: Sofie E Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great for my oily skin!
customer_reviews.text: I am 33 and for the first time have acne. So I've had to switch up my skin care products. I bought this mask after reading reviews and I love it. I use it 4-5 times a week and my skin is brighter and my pores seemed like they shrunk right away. It also seems like it has helped control the oiliness of my skin. Can't beat the price or the results!
customer_reviews.author: Red XIII

customer_reviews.title: Smells good and gives me smooth skin!
customer_reviews.text: The charcoal clay mask is wonderful. I put mine on before I hop in the shower and rinse it off when I'm done with everything else. It makes my skin feel so smooth and I love the smell. However because it is detoxifying and I don't use on a really regular basis, sometimes I break out afterward as it pulls some of the junk more to the surface but not out.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Parker

customer_reviews.title: Burnt my face
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews that were pretty mixed, I decided to purchase the product and give an honest review. I have slightly sensitive skin, and after wear the mask for two minutes began to feel a burning sensation on my face. I removed the mask and it was burning red. The redness did not go away for hours. I was so concerned I almost went to get checked out by a doctor. Do not purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: Candy Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I have hormonal and cystic acne and this works WONDERS. If I have an outbreak, I do the charcoal mask over my entire face. I then spot treat the next days until the outbreak starts diminishing. I do keep the mask on longer than 15 minutes, and it doesn’t irritate my face. I have noticed huge differences the next day after using the mask. It noticeably shrinks the pimple, and begins to reduce redness. Even my boyfriend has commented on the changes over the course of several days (and this is when I had a HORRIBLE outbreak). I use this product in addition to my daily skin care routine (and acne creams)
customer_reviews.author: regan

customer_reviews.title: My go to face mask
customer_reviews.text: I have psoriasis and thankfully it’s not on my face but I do have extremely sensitive skin because of it. This face mask has been my favorite and routine for a while now. It exfoliates well which I love, but the one thing i don’t like is the smell. It’s not a bad scent, it’s just not a scent I would say I love. Makes my face baby soft every time I use it and it’s kept my skin looking great. I’m 33 and constantly am told I don’t look a day over 24 or 25. Nor sure is it’s because of this product or not, as I do use a few different things in conjunction, but I’ll take it!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Serious Exfoliation
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite exfoliator. I don't really use it like a mask I use it as a scrub once a week. You can really feel and see the difference. I will say that my skin can take a beating though and if you have very sensitive skin I would get something less abrasive. But for those of us who hate flaky skin and clogged pores this is a great addition to the skin care routine.
customer_reviews.author: LolaB

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I got this product to help with my Glamglow addiction as I cannot afford to use Glamglow as frequently As i like using masks and I heard this was a good one. The mask feels fine, its doesn't feel like its doing anything the way Glamglow does . the amount of product for the price is good and it feels thick and luxurious, My number one complaint is I absolutely cannot stand the smell. I hate when people say that and normally I could care less if it makes my skin look better I mean Ive done Mayo Masks lol but this smells like old grandpa cologne.
customer_reviews.author: chelsea frye

customer_reviews.title: Great product for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I've been using it for approximately a year and it really evens out my skin, makes it bright, and my face feels amazing after. I have lupus and rosacea, so my skin gets irritated easily, and this is one product that doesn't cause my skin to get inflamed. Ensure you mix it well before each use to allow the oil to distribute evenly, other whys it'll be thick/clumpy and will then require more product each use. I use a rubber tip brush, mix, and apply it to my face.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Krebs

customer_reviews.title: Makes My Skin Feel Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I really love this face mask. It's smooth and thick and you can definitely feel the results when you take it off. The only thing is that it's difficult to get off. If you wash it off in the sink, you'll spend 5 minutes on it. I recommend putting it on just before a shower and rinsing it off there. Overall, it does a great job at clearing your skin and I will definitely get this face mask again!
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Works but fragrant
customer_reviews.text: This mask does help with some of my oil control. I think that’s the clay working it’s magic. I like the little granules to help exfoliate when I wash it off but my dermatologist isn’t crazy about physician exfoliants so I probably won’t repurchase. I think this has a very strong scent. My mom likes it- she describes it as “fruity”. I think it smells like an old lady perfume. I can’t put it too close to my eye or they’ll water from the fragrance in it. If you don’t mind fragrant skin care you may like it.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I have had extremely oily skin all my life and it's been difficult to find anything to help. I love Glamglow products but they are very expensive so I don't use them all. I saw reviews for this charcoal mask and thought I would give it a try. Wow. It pulls lots of oil out of my skin. I still have oily skin after but it's not as bad as it was, which is a great improvement. After I use this mask, I follow up with Glamglow Thirsty mud hydrating mask and my skin is so soft and nice. The charcoal mask is also making my pores smaller, which is great as well.
customer_reviews.author: blueoleander

customer_reviews.title: It was melted and the packaging was damaged.
customer_reviews.text: I don't really know if this is because of the delivery or the product, but when I opened it, it was melted sideways in the jar. The cream wasn't settled to the bottom of the jar and it was almost leaking out. The packaging was nearly crushed too. This makes me thing the product was thrown around and left in the sun. I don't know if the heat could make the product less effective because I didn't feel any results. I don't really have much else to say other than I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Elliot Warren

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product after looking for glam glow super mud and a customer review recommended this Loreal Pure clay mask that they thought was equal to glam glow and a fraction of the price. I agree. This product is amazing. I've used it a few times and it has always helped clear up any blemishes and gives a deep down clean feeling. I love the affordable price and the adorable container it comes in.
customer_reviews.author: monica baker

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 recommend
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical trying this because of the price I figured it was just another cheap product that doesn’t do what it says. But after the first use my skin was definitely a lot brighter. I’ve started using this every 3 days and I haven’t had a break out since I started using this product. It goes on very smooth and dries within 10 minutes. It washes off very easily with warm water. It has a weird smell but it’s definitely tolerable.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: Gave me a chemical burn/ faulty warehouse
customer_reviews.text: I don’t want this review to effect the L’Oréal face mask itself. In the past I loved this mask and used it regularly. However after purchasing from AMAZON, the product gave me a chemical burn on my face. I don’t think that this distrusting center should be trusted. When buying the product from Albertsons or ULTA I had no issues and loved the mask.
customer_reviews.author: bupisha

customer_reviews.title: Used.
customer_reviews.text: It looks like some previously opened the product. Packaging had a tear (someone struggled to open it) and the safety seal fell right off when I uncapped the jar. The contents of the jar appear untouched but I’m still hesitant to use this. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Esmeralda Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Holy grail
customer_reviews.text: This is my holy grail for face masks, it instantly brightens my face up and I use it as a spot treatment overnight for pimples
customer_reviews.author: Shermin ali

customer_reviews.title: Gentle exfoliator
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask! I received a sample of 3 of the newer masks a while back, and this one stood out the most! I love how it gently exfoliates, and isn't harsh like some I've used. It leaves me feeling soft and refreshed after. The smell is great too. I wish more came in a jar, but it's worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Wright

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD  FACE MASK
customer_reviews.text: Definitely noticed an improvement from the first use..tried in my mom who has a sensitive skin..worked for her as well...good product and worth every $ spent...so much better than expensive store bought ones. Loved it
customer_reviews.author: Chiran Nawalage

customer_reviews.title: Really like this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Really like this stuff. It may be the first mask I've used where I can immediately see a subtle difference between the before and after. However, you need to use it multiple times a week in order to really make a difference...which is tough for me. A con: I wish it came with some sort of brush or applicator to help apply. It's easy to wash off your hands but never fun to get gray gook all over.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Great for combination skin, great mask!
customer_reviews.text: Great face mask. I purchased this for my combination skin & have no regrets. This will be my second jar because I enjoy using it so much. I use approx. twice a week & could notice a difference in the brightness/clearness of my skin. Smells great, has a slight gritty texture for gentle exfoliation. Product arrived in original packaging & was clean, I will definitely order another instead of purchasing in-store
customer_reviews.author: ProgrammingPrincess

customer_reviews.title: Good Clay Mask but Not the Best
customer_reviews.text: It feels like a very moisturizing face mask after my first use. I have used the black dark clay version and that one feels a lot tighter on my face, which might be better for minimizing pores. I like this product so far but will need to try it out more to write a great review, but I do like it so far. My face feels exfoliated. Good price for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Chu

customer_reviews.title: Amazing but not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This mud mask is AMAZING! It works so well and I can feel my pores tighten. I love how it only dries the areas that has open pores which gives you a clear picture on where are the problematic areas on your face or neck. It is very strong so not recommend for sensitive skin, it also has a strong pleasant sent which does not bother me but if you’re looking for a no scented mask this would not be it.
customer_reviews.author: Kati Echeverria

customer_reviews.title: Spa Qualirt pore cleanwe
customer_reviews.text: Just received this product yesterday... WOW it’s AMAZING! I CAN feel it tighten my pores and pulling out impurity’s as it dries. It’s FABULOUS and smell is okay too... so far am glad I found this product! If you want clean bright looking skin then buy this NOW!
customer_reviews.author: Tea lover

customer_reviews.title: I never write reviews but I was so disappointed I had to throw the entire container away after ...
customer_reviews.text: The fragrance is so strong it is overwhelming and not pleasant. After you are done using on it, the smell stays on your face for the entire day. It was awful. I never write reviews but I was so disappointed I had to throw the entire container away after one use.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Gatto

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I keep up with taking care of my skin. I don't have sensitive skin. I use very inexpensive products & they work well for me. I treated myself to these for self care days and my husband noticed an even better improvement on my skin. I use all 3 in one day! It relaxes me & leaves my skin glowing. I will always keep these stacked at home.
customer_reviews.author: LSPayor

customer_reviews.title: Shipped old broken product
customer_reviews.text: The bottle came completely shattered. All of the contents were hard as a rock, so it had been broken for awhile and shipped like that. The contents do not smell good at all. I now have to return the shattered contents of the box in order to get my money back. But I will not be buying the same mask.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good but Misleading
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the product is 5 stars all around. This is one of the best face masks I’ve ever used. The reason I give it 4 stars is because there is some false advertising. The box is twice as big as the case. The product doesn’t even take up much of the basin at all. It just feels disappointing, and that’s not what I want from a product, even if I already know how good it is
customer_reviews.author: Justin Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: This helps remove fine lines and smooths the skin after exfoliating
customer_reviews.text: What I like about this product is how well it actually works. It does what it's supposed to do. You get better results the more it's frequently used. It doesn't smell bad either. I like how soft and smooth my skin feels after I use it. Definitely try it out, if you haven't.
customer_reviews.author: Juro

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! I love mud masks in general, but this one has a small amount of grit in it. So, you get a mask and a light exfoliation. I have been using this twice a week, and my pores are notably smaller and my skin is clearer.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Whitford

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My favorite mask. Very thick and creamy to spread on, I use wet fingers and a damp face to get it smooth. It takes a fair amount of water to wash off when it dries but it leaves my skin so smooth and soft. I use a biore strip afterwards and between those 2 my face looks smooth and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Abbi

customer_reviews.title: Hydration and exfoliating cream
customer_reviews.text: Great product, smells great and exfoliates well. My skin feels soft, moisturized and refresh. Helps keep my skin even tone and glowing.
customer_reviews.author: gracious

customer_reviews.title: Nice results
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I’m a fan. It’s very smooth & easy to spread. It doesn’t have a scent that I’ve noticed. And it’s nice for sensitive skin. My skin looks pretty bright & clearer the next morning after use. And great value
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mask!
customer_reviews.text: This mask is awesome for the price! I apply it with a brush, go fiddle around for 15-20 minutes, and then scrub it off with a soft cloth. It really seems to make my skin feel and look smooth and healthy. I will definitely repurchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: Labbottomy

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing Charcoal Facial
customer_reviews.text: I just got this yesterday. Are used it today and my face feels very clean and smooth. I got it to remove some blackheads around my nose so we’ll see how it looks in about three weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Blue

customer_reviews.title: Love this to keep my pores clear
customer_reviews.text: I use this mask routinely, it rivals pricier masks! It keeps my pores clear, helps balance my combination skin, and also helps keep hormonal acne at bay if I’m faithful with it - about 2x per week. It does go quickly, but at this price who cares?
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Reiff

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied with packaging
customer_reviews.text: It’s unfortunate I didn’t get to try this product, upon receiving it the package was severely damaged as the pictures will show and it was taped closed😳. That alone was enough for me not to even bother putting that on my face.. it looks to have been tampered with. I’m sure the product itself would have been fine. But I’m not sure who did the tampering and bootleg job but it’s a no for me
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Nice exfoliating clay mask
customer_reviews.text: Nice unscented clay mask. Difficult to wash off. Wouldn’t recommend for sensitive skin. This is more exfoliating in nature. Wouldn’t use more than once a week. Tightens pores. Like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: WendyF

customer_reviews.title: Chalky and hard to rinse off
customer_reviews.text: It was almost impossible to remove this charcoal mask once dry. It took a lot of scrubbing and repeating rinsing the two attempts I made. Wasn't worth the time or effort. Threw away the product.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: need to put description on jar
customer_reviews.text: I bought several different masks. They do not say what they're for on the jar. It's only on the box. I want to throw the box away, I have to keep it to know which one is which.
customer_reviews.author: gayleb

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this mask. Not only does it dry on your face nicely, it exfoliates so well when you're taking it off. Makes my skin feel so clean and soft after using!
customer_reviews.author: Haley K

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great for cleaning out the pores and giving your entire ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second jar of this. This stuff is great for cleaning out the pores and giving your entire face a good cleansing and detoxifying. I recommend using it right before you get into the shower. It makes cleanup a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: S. Shuler

customer_reviews.title: 🚨 **SEVERE ATHSMA TRIGGER** ⚠️
customer_reviews.text: This product is seething with dangerous chemicals and it’s taken me 2 days to fully recover! There should be a a warning ⚠️ on this site and on the boxes product description.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny 2

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Anyone!
customer_reviews.text: This Clay Mask is Brilliant! I'm 55 Years Old. I've used masks for many years. This mask is wonderful. It reminds me of the Mud masks of the Eighties. It's Smooth, clean, and simple. It works easily. Removes easily. This will be my New Go-To Product.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn H.

customer_reviews.title: NOT brand new
customer_reviews.text: I expected to receive a brand new one but the one that arrived, the box was poorly taped up and the face mask had been clearly used And was cracked with dry pieces of the mask in it. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: There are better masks out there and this takes FOREVER to dry
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. There are better masks out there and this takes FOREVER to dry. Invest in something better.
customer_reviews.author: ktbstudent

customer_reviews.title: Great product, would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Was scared at first to order, thought it leave black in the pours, like blackheads but it didn't. Easy to use and skin looks great. Cheaper than the stores.
customer_reviews.author: susan calvert

customer_reviews.title: Recommended Buy
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Although I had to laugh at myself in the mirror. I was both black and white all in the same day. Once I washed the mask off, my face felt clean soft smooth and light.
customer_reviews.author: plopez

customer_reviews.title: Good exfoliating mask
customer_reviews.text: Leaves my face feeling smooth and soft. Way cheaper than anything else I've tried that's actually worked. I can see how it might irritate sensitive skin (it does mine a bit) but I only use periodically.
customer_reviews.author: dc-tex

customer_reviews.title: Good mask
customer_reviews.text: I got this is on a whim and I'm pretty happy with it. Easy to wipe off. I feel it removes excess oil from my face. Nice mask. No scent that I've noticed.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Lindstrom

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stuff I use it 2-3 times a week it really helps when my face gets oily. It does make your face soft, I don’t think the smell bothers me but maybe to others it will.
customer_reviews.author: Asad Barron

customer_reviews.title: You will love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask! It is a great quality for the price. I thought this wouldn't last too long, but it lasted longer than I anticipated. My skin feels a lot better after using this mask 2-3x a week. I would absolutely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: 1st pic is earlier last year, started using this product 3 days a week since September. It's been 7 months and my usual large pore and acne prone face looks much better!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Fav Clay mask!
customer_reviews.text: Ive tried to use a mask once a week or so, and with turning 35 this year I have felt a drastic improvement in my skin since adding this to my skin care routine.
customer_reviews.author: C. Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Smooth
customer_reviews.text: As a Men, I'll tell you Loreal is the only product I mostly use when it comes to facial cleansing at all times. Always the Clay or Charcoal, It'sjust the right stuff to use.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: Okay-ish mask , the only thing I don’t like is the strong perfume smell. I mean it would smell good as perfume.. but I’m more of an all natural type of gal, so i probably won’t re order for that reason .
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Great for my skin
customer_reviews.text: I like this face mask. This is the second one I’ve bought. Goes on smooth and washes off nicely. My skin feels so soft after using it. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Definitely cleans out pores. 🤗
customer_reviews.text: I've used the black one twice and the pink one once. I honestly love the black one. My skin feels amazing and it really does help clean out the pores as you can tell in the picture. I have such an oily chin and get hormone pimples often. But I hoping this helps so far I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Sabreena Sarmiento

customer_reviews.title: love playing with masks but never feel like they do ...
customer_reviews.text: love playing with masks but never feel like they do much EXCEPT this one! My pores instantly smaller, skin felt smoother etc... love it!
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Good facemask
customer_reviews.text: Noticeable result after just one use. I have tried a few products and this is by far the best one, you can actually see the dust once the mask is dry... The only thing I don't like is the size. It is so small
customer_reviews.author: Roy H

customer_reviews.title: This is a great clay mask
customer_reviews.text: This is a great clay mask, it really helps refine my pores. The only complaint is that it makes my skin oily.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Broke me out
customer_reviews.text: Either invest in a better product or just get your regular Aztec clay mask. This broke me out so bad. I never break out on my forehead, it's just not suitable.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Not enough product
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive, textured skin, large pores, and acne. It works pretty well in the sense that my skin feels softer and smoother, but I don't notice a difference with my pores. There also isn't a whole lot in the package so if you use it three times a week like the directions suggest, it'll be gone in less than 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Europa

customer_reviews.title: Suck the oils out of your face 😀
customer_reviews.text: This product will suck everything out of your face which is great for oily skin that experience breakouts like I do. I would say that follow with a good moisturizer because it will leave your face really dry. Other than that it's fraet and I will buy more, I just with it was bigger since its VERY SMALL compared to its price
customer_reviews.author: janet

customer_reviews.title: Best drugstore exfoliating scrub!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great exfoliating scrub that I use once a week. It exfoliates without irritating and seems to brighten and soothe my 59 year old face.
customer_reviews.author: SandraB

customer_reviews.title: I’ve been using it for a year!
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with this clay, it’s make your skin soft and clean , it’s helpful for reducing pores . The price are great
customer_reviews.author: Amazing look up!!

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: This product worked well enough for me. I am going to try to use it once a week to see if I get better results. Learned about this specific mask through a “must have” beauty article I was reading and this was high on the list.
customer_reviews.author: The Mrs

customer_reviews.title: pretty good but not the best
customer_reviews.text: it is good and I do see a difference after applying but the only thing is the strong smell of fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: TAN GIRL!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!! I looked like the tan girl from the movie "Christmas with the Krans" but it feels amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Anahi Castillejos

customer_reviews.title: My favorite mask!
customer_reviews.text: I have used so many different face masks and always come back to this one. It makes my face feel good!
customer_reviews.author: danny freibrun

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This product works but not really good for sensitive skin, had some redness as remove the mask
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: eh
customer_reviews.text: im really upset w this face mask. the first time i used it i fell in love w it and then by the 4th time i noticed that my face started to have really bad acne. i worked so hard and had to be careful of what i eat to stop the ance from coming and now im back to square one. im really upset
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Brands of Masks
customer_reviews.text: I really like these masks! My favorite it the Blue Seaweed one. If you have acne, it actually calms the skin around the acne breakouts; it's nice.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: It’s an okay mask, not too good and not too bad. For the price it’s pretty eh.
customer_reviews.author: Jia Gao

customer_reviews.title: Smells like my grandfather's cologne
customer_reviews.text: I'm not particularly sensitive to smells, but this mask smells like strong cologne. The smell lingered even after I washed off the product. I didn't notice any significant change to my skin, but the smell was unbearable. I won't be buying this again
customer_reviews.author: cityofmirrors

customer_reviews.title: Smell is unpleasant
customer_reviews.text: Con it smells so unpleasant impossible to bare with it.
customer_reviews.author: I. Li

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend it and I will definitely buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I have oily skin with large pores. this product cleans the skin, removes all impurities and dead skin, and does not irritate in any way. I would recommend it and I will definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Nemo

customer_reviews.title: Not for acne prone skin.
customer_reviews.text: I live the blue mask way better. This charcoal one tends to break me out.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Good mask
customer_reviews.text: Great mask, a little goes a long way, easy to spread with a mask spatula, good price point.
customer_reviews.author: catherine

customer_reviews.title: and painful. Redness and pain have calmed down now
customer_reviews.text: Made me break out 2 days after applying on my face. Pimples were inflamed, red, and painful. Redness and pain have calmed down now, but not my feelings towards this product. Guess it doesn’t work for oily skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the facility to spread and to clean it, the only thing I would change is the scent (but if you don't bother with scents you'll be fine)
customer_reviews.author: Gabriele Nascimento

customer_reviews.title: SOOO silky and smooth! Deep pore cleaning!
customer_reviews.text: It goes on sooooo smooth and silky! Perfect for oily/acne prone/ or combination skin. It does have a pretty strong perfume/chemical smell that I don't like very much but despite that the results were amazing! It pulls all the bad oils out of your face but doesn't leave you feeling stripped (you should still moisturize afterwards though)! It leaves the face feeling and looking rejuvenated and smooth (And toned) with a much more even complexion after deep cleaning the pores ;)
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine J.

customer_reviews.title: Removes makeup and dirt
customer_reviews.text: This really helps my skin breathe after a week of using makeup. If I don't use this my pores become very clogged and that is when I start to break out. It also evens face tone very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Berenice Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Great deep clean
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask. I've been using it for a few years now. Target stopped selling it so luckily I was able to find it on Amazon. This mask cleans really deep into your pores.
customer_reviews.author: JESSICA MARCY

customer_reviews.title: Great mask for great price
customer_reviews.text: Great for oily skin. Helps skin look less tired and dull.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You need this face mask!
customer_reviews.text: Best face mask for acne prone skin!!! As it dries you can see all of your pores! My face always feels 10X cleaner after using this mask
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Jaramillo

customer_reviews.title: dry fast does the job
customer_reviews.text: its good but if touches clothes, not come off eassly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent price for a decent mask
customer_reviews.text: This mask is cool, but it did nothing really crazy for me. Maybe I need to give it another chance, but it’s still a pretty good mask at a decent price tag!
customer_reviews.author: Maytal

customer_reviews.title: Love clay
customer_reviews.text: Clay is great for cleaning out your pores! Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Almost every product breaks out my skin but not this one
customer_reviews.author: Exhausted pigeon

customer_reviews.title: Great for acne
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best thing I ever did for my acne. I'm 26 and have been using this for about 3 years now. Whenever I go more than two weeks without using it, I feel greasy and start breaking out again. I only wish I had this when I was a teenager.
customer_reviews.author: Another customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: The very 1st time I tried this, I could feeling it work. I use it 2-3times a week, and definitely see the difference. This is on my subscribe and save. Love this
customer_reviews.author: penney harrison

customer_reviews.title: Once a week or twice is enough.
customer_reviews.text: For use the most twice a week. It does the job.
customer_reviews.author: nazariom

customer_reviews.title: HappyFace.
customer_reviews.text: This mask works great. It goes on wonderfully smooth. You don't need to use a large amount when applying to your face. After I apply the mask I let it set for about 15 to 20 minutes on my face. I could actually feel the mask drawing out all kinds of oil and debris from my face. When it was time to rinse my face, it was easy to remove. Afterwards my face looked and felt so clean and bright. Great product. I use the mask about once a week.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: works amazing when detoxing my skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and keep buying it over and over. This clay mask makes my pores smaller and my skin looks tighter. I usually use twice a week.
customer_reviews.author: Kacie

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: It makes my skin feel soft and moisturized after using. Great product and will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Heather & Aaron

product_meta.title: Clay Facial Mask, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Pure Clay Face Mask with Charcoal for Dull Skin to Detox & Brighten Skin, at home face mask, 1.7 oz.
product_meta.description: Style Name:Detoxify & IlluminateFor best skincare results use Pure Clay face mask 3 times per week leaving on for 10 to 15 minutes per use
feature_bullets: Cleansing Treatment Face mask with 3 Pure Clays and Charcoal reduces dull skin and increases luminosity for immediate at home results; skin looks brighter with a healthy glow, skin looks smoother and skin tone looks more even

Pure Clay mask is formulated to provide a luxurious skincare experience while potent pure clays and charcoal act like a magnet to clean out pores, draw-out and capture deep impurities such as dirt, oil, and pollution
This creamy, non-drying face mask with charcoal leaves skin feeling clean, velvety, and rebalanced, addressing your dull, tired skin to reveal a purified, even, and radiant complexion
Use after use skin is clean as if detoxified, skin feels as though it can breathe better and skin is healthy looking
For best skincare results use Pure Clay face mask 3 times per week leaving on for 10 to 15 minutes per use

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
